Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir,

I inform you that tonight the firefighter I had sent to Boa Vista arrived and says that Bento Manuel is at Triunfo waiting for the rest of the men because he received orders from the president of the raid to withdraw with the force and all the police to Piratini, saying it is because of a large legal force descending from Cima da Serra; they also say that the gunboats have already fired a great deal; Estevão offers to administer the fort and command the piece; and if Your Excellency

God preserve Your Excellency  
Camp Picada, November 14, 1838.  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Tomás José da Silva.  
Francisco Pedro de Abreu.  
Major Commander of the Picada Detachment.
